item.title: A Historic Opportunity for Regime Change in Iran
item.description: We can do a lot to further hollow out the regime’s capacity to project power, but only the Iranian people can push it over.

item.title: How Many Stephen Spencer Pittmans Are Out There?
item.description: As the arson attack on a Mississippi synagogue shows, there are increasingly high hurdles to stopping hate.

item.title: The Restoration of Federal Funding for Planned Parenthood Is Yet Another Bad Sign for Pro-Lifers
item.description: Is the administration’s decision a temporary setback, or another pro-life retreat?

item.title: The Anti-ICE Insurgency
item.description: What we’re seeing in Minneapolis is not peaceful protest.

item.title: FBI Searches Home of Washington Post Reporter
item.description: The objective is likely to identify leakers with an eye toward firing them.
